entities.name: prime minister
entities.description: The Prime Minister is the head of government in the country. The text describes him as 'weakly' and mentions that he is trying not to betray a flicker of surprise or alarm when Cornelius Fudge appears through the flames.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Cornelius Fudge is a portly man who appears through the flames. He is described as wearing a long pinstriped cloak and a lime-green bowler hat.

relationships.description: The Prime Minister meets Cornelius Fudge when he appears through the flames. The text describes their interaction as 'Good to see you again'.
